direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods interact with the list of unknown attributes, with getAttribute retrieving and addAttributeID adding attribute IDs.
Both methods query the list of unknown attributes, with contains checking for the presence of an attribute ID and getAttribute retrieving it by index.
Both methods involve operations on the list of unknown attributes, with encode converting the list to a binary format and getAttribute retrieving an attribute by index.
Both methods handle attribute data, with decodeAttributeBody parsing binary data into attribute IDs and getAttribute retrieving an attribute by index.

enhanced_by.reason: addAttributeID is used to populate the list of unknown attributes, which is necessary for getAttribute to retrieve attributes.
contains can be used to verify the presence of an attribute before calling getAttribute to retrieve it.
The binary representation generated by encode can be used to verify the correctness of the attribute list after calling getAttribute.
